answers.answer: Hello,An erection problem is the inability to get or maintain an erection that is firm enough for a man to have intercourse. If the condition persists, the medical term is erectile dysfunction. Causes may be psychological, smoking, alcohol, illicit drugs and medical conditions like diabetes, high blood pressure, heart or thyroid conditions, poor circulation, low testosterone, depression, spinal cord and neurological causes. To exactly pinpoint a diagnosis you need to get a complete examination done from a urologist. It may be due to your medicines and you may need to change them or get the dose monitored.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

I PLAN TO FOLLOW-UP WITH MY UROLOGIST AT MY NEXT APPOINTMENT AT THE END OF OCTOBER. MY PCP CHECKED MY TESTOSTERONE LEVELS IN 2012. THE LEVEL WAS VERY LOW. I WAS PLACED ON TESTOSTERONE SHOTS EVERY 2 WEEKS FOR 3 MONTHS. THIS STILL DID NOT HELP. I AM A SMOKER. I SUFFER FROM EPILEPSY AND SCHIZO-AFFECTIVE BI-POLAR DISORDER SO I HAVE MANIC/DEPRESSION ALOT. MY TESTOSTERONE LEVEL WAS RECHECKED ON JUNE 2013 BY MY UROLOGIST WHICH I WILL FIND THE RESULTS OUT AT MY NEXT UROLOGIST APPOINTMENT ALSO.

I had a conversation with my urologist. Other things are being addressed at this time. However he did say my testosterone level was 6.2. Is this considered normal/high/low? He does want me to bring my wife in for one of my appointments with him after he addresses other problems with tests.

question: DURING SEX WITH MY WIFE I LOSE MY ERECTION AND AT OTHER TIMES I AM UNABLE TO EVEN GET A FULL ERECTION. EVEN WITH MASTURBATION I DON'T SEEM TO GET A FULL ERECTION. WHEN I DO MASTURBATE I SOMETIMES EJACTULATE BUT ALOT OF THE TIME I DON'T. I HAVE TRIED CIALIS TO IMPROVE MY SEX LIFE BUT THIS DIDN'T EVEN SEEM TO HELP ME GET AN ERECTION STRONG ENOUGH TO HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE WITH MY WIFE. I AM ON THE FOLLOWING MEDICATIONS FOR VARIOUS REASONS:1)THIORIDAZINE, 2)LANSOPRAZOLE, 3)MONTELUKAST,4)DIVALPROEXE, 5)ZONISAMIDE, 6)LEVETIRACETAM, 7)BUSPIRONE,8)CELEBREX, 9)TOLTERODINE, 10)COLESTIPOL, 11)SUCRALFATE,12)PROPANTHELINE BROMIDE, 13)SYMBICORT INHALER,14)DUO-NEB NEBULIZER SOLUTIONS, 15)PROCTOSOL CREAM.APPRECIATE ANY REPLIESJUNEBUG68
title: UNABLE TO MAINTAIN ERECTION WITH WIFE
